backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing access control, storage mixins, data types, and CRUD endpoints for users, submissions, payments, reference library, documents, and draft motions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state into the expanded new state with reference library, case documents, and draft motions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping required features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for documentation or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root mount node and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React router configuration defining all routes, layouts, and new feature pages with auth gating.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal for new authenticated users to enter and save profile details using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Protects children by showing a login-required message when the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, and a legal notice.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides the main header with navigation, logo, and login/logout handling including mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/stripe/PaymentSe: Shows an admin-only modal to configure Stripe secret key and allowed countries, saving settings via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, case submissions, payments, Stripe config, and checkout sessions using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining light/dark theme variables, global styles, and print-specific overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard showing system payment setup and a table of all case submissions with status and details.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReferenceLibrary: Admin interface for adding and viewing legal reference library entries with form submission and access control.
frontend/src/pages/CardCheckoutPage.tsx: Stripe card payment page that creates a checkout session for a case submission and redirects the user to Stripe.
frontend/src/pages/CaseSubmissionConfirm: Confirmation page displaying a submission ID, next steps, and navigation options after successful case submission.
frontend/src/pages/CaseSubmissionPage.ts: Renders a case submission form requiring authentication, collects case details and payment method, and creates a case before navigating to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CashAppInstructionsPa: Displays Cash App payment instructions for a submission and allows users to submit their Cash App username as a payment reference.
frontend/src/pages/CashAtStoreReceiptPag: Generates a printable cash‑at‑store payment receipt with a payment code and lets users mark the payment as completed.
frontend/src/pages/ContactDisclaimerPage: Shows contact info, business hours, and a legal disclaimer stating the service is not legal advice or representation.
frontend/src/pages/DraftMotionsPage.tsx: Displays draft motions for a submission, handles loading/error states, and provides navigation to create new drafts.
frontend/src/pages/DraftMotionWizardPage: Provides a multi‑step wizard to draft and save a legal motion for a submission, including auto‑generated motion content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and calls to action for submitting a case or learning more.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains the four-step process for using the service and provides guidance on what users should prepare.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Informs the user that a payment was cancelled and offers options to retry, check status, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Shows available payment methods and routes users based on selection and submission ID.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentStatusPage.tsx: Allows users to look up a submission by ID and displays its status, including loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a confirmation screen after successful payment with next steps and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/PayPalInstructionsPag: Shows PayPal payment instructions and lets users submit a transaction ID for their submission.
Provides a searchable interface for legal reference entries with selectable detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists service offerings with descriptions and features plus a disclaimer about non-legal representation.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionDocumentsPa: Allows users to upload and manage documents for a submission with validation and upload progress handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, features, architectural notes, and versioning for the Criminal Defence 305 platform focused on legal support and payment workflows.
